block_condition.description: The block condition type to check for on the block that is overlapping with the entity's feet.
block_condition.markdownDescription: The block condition type to check for on the block that is overlapping with the entity's feet.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md)

Checks whether a block that fulfills the specified [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/in_block) is overlapping with the entity's feet.

Type ID: `origins:in_block`
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md)

Checks whether a block that fulfills the specified [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/in_block) is overlapping with the entity's feet.

Type ID: `origins:in_block`
